Entries.Alex: #$c .5#Hmmph. This is not good weather for sports, but... oh well, I can always lift weights inside.#Days like this let the truly dedicated show their mettle.#$b#What? I know some words.

Entries.summer_16.000: Gosh, @, I think I might have shin splits.$s
Entries.summer_16.001: Alright, doc, how bad is it?

Entries.summer_10{{YearRemainder}}: Hey, @, will you be a the luau tomorrow?$h
Entries.1: I'm gonna be famous one day, @, just you wait.
Entries.2: One day, I'm gonna go pro and be all over TV.#$e#And I'll have all the branded footwear I could ever want.$h
Entries.1_2: When I was young, we had a little corner shop that sold the best burgers and fries.#$e#Sadly, it closed down years ago.
Entries.2_2: Ugh, I think I'm out of protein powder. Gotta order more online.
Entries.3{{YearRemainder}}: Selling ice cream at the little stand? That was my summer job ever since high school. Makes me a little money.
Entries.5{{YearRemainder}}: Boy am I glad to not be in high school anymore. I had to wake up at like three in the morning to make practice at five.
Entries.6{{YearRemainder}}: I train six days a week, every week.$h
Entries.7{{YearRemainder}}: Got any farm-fresh eggs, @? Nothing like a nice egg in the morning.$h
Entries.8{{YearRemainder}}: Pops used to take me fishing, back when...#$b#No, no reason to dwell on that.
Entries.9{{YearRemainder}}: Gotta work on my squat form today.#$b#And no, it's not an excuse to look at myself in the mirror.$h
Entries.10{{YearRemainder}}: Sometimes it feels like everyone is just tryin' to sell you some supplement or another.$s
Entries.summer_Sun8: Hey, @, you wanna play some frisbee?

Changes.LogName: Alex - mid hearts - Y1 - with pet

Entries.Resort_Towel_2: Come join me, @, I'm working on my tan!
Entries.winter_Mon4: Maybe I should take up hockey?#$e#@, you think I'd be good at hockey?#$e#What am I'm saying, I'm good at everything.
Entries.winter_Wed8: Probably gonna go lift weights.#$e#Working out outside is so much more fun, though.
Entries.winter_Sat8: Hey @, what's your favorite hockey club?#$e#I've been thinking of going to a game sometime, you in?
Entries.winter_Sun8: After a nice session lifting weights, I love taking a dip in the spa.$h
Entries.Fri8: You know what, @? While I'd love to go pro some day, I'm not sure I should leave my Grandma and Grandpa alone right now.
Entries.4_2: @! I saw a new exercise on social media the other day. Can't wait to try it out.#$e#Basically, you kneel on the ground, and get someone to hold your feet still...#$b#Then you lean forward until your nose is on the floor. It's surprisingly hard!
Entries.6_2: There's nothing like a nice early morning run.$h
Entries.7_2: If I don't work out, I don't feel right.$s
Entries.8_2: Sam showed me a video on bouldering. I'm amazed at what these athletes can do!
Entries.10_2: Nothing like some nice fresh salmon for dinner!$h%revealtasteAlex212#$b#$c .9#My granny's a great cook, and I'm definitely learning a lot from her.#Here, I've got some extra![212]#
Entries.11_2: Sam and I went running this morning. Company's always nice on a long run.#$b#Hey, @, would you ever be interested?
Entries.13_2: Grandma thinks I might make a good physical trainer some day.
Entries.14_2: It's important to adapt exercises to what you can do.#$b#Trying to do something too hard will just get you injured.#$e#In middle school I broke my ankle and had to sit out for weeks because I tried to copy a skateboard trick from Sam.
Entries.15_2: Haley and I are thinking of going down to %place to catch a %name Taylor concert. You in?$h
Entries.17_2: I love nothing more than running along the beach.$h
Entries.18_2: Have you ever used a foam roller, @? Helps loosen those muscles right up.$h
Entries.19_2: Wasn't paying attention the other day, tripped over a tree root.$s#$e#Hopefully I didn't twist my ankle.$s
Entries.20_2: I've got so much I need to learn about nutrition...say, @, you think I could get Maru to tutor me sometime?
Entries.21_2: Looking good, @! Did you change anything in your routine?
Entries.22_2: Think I should pick up a new pair of shoes, this pair might be getting a bit dated.

Entries.Indoor_Day_3: #$c .5#Heya, @, I made you some salmon! Just like my grannie's old recipe[212]$h.#Made you some fish for today! You're gonna need the protein! [212 213 214]
Entries.Good_0: @, I love you so so much!
Entries.Good_1: Looking good today, @. You do anything different with your hair?
Entries.summer_Alex: #$c .5#Mmmm. Such a nice day, maybe I should go swimming?#Summer's my favorite season, I've always have the most energy.$h

Entries.3_2: Emily gave me a recipe for a chia seed smoothie the other day! Plenty of protein in it, and it tastes great!$h
Entries.5_2: You know, @, if my sports career never happens, maybe I should go into politics?#$b#I do have a 'winning smile'.$h
Entries.6_2: We used to have to bus for more than an hour to get to the nearest high school.#$e#Won't be so bad for Jas and Vincent, though, there's a newer high school closer to us now.
Entries.7_2: I've been trying to work towards a dragon squat lately, but man do you need flexibility for that.$s

Entries.Fri10: I've gotta stay strong for Grandma and Grandpa. I'm all they've got, now.
Entries.summer_Sun4: It's an election year, @!#$b#Do I think the Governor is going to get re-elected? Of course I do, he always gets re-elected.
Entries.summer_Wed8: Might go take a swim in the ocean today. @, you in?$h
Entries.summer_27_2: Gosh, @, summer's almost over, isn't it? The Moonlight Jellies are gonna be here tomorrow.
Entries.2_2: My grandparents are the most important people in the world to me.$h
Entries.3_2: When I was young, I'd bike around and deliver the newspaper. But most people don't want paper newspapers anymore.#$b#It's all TV and online news now. Even Gramps doesn't read the paper anymore.#$e#Man I'm starting to sound like him, am I?
Entries.4_2: @, what sport did you play in high school?
Entries.6_2: Lewis has been mayor for as long as I can remember. That's some job security, eh?#$b#Have I considered running? Sure. But it sounds boring.
Entries.7_2: If Lewis wasn't mayor anymore...I don't know, I'd probably vote for Gus. Everyone loves Gus.

Entries.1_2: Ah, start of the new month, what new exercises should I do?$h
Entries.3_2: @, I did five hundred squats yesterday. Five hundred!#$b#Assuming I didn't miscount.
Entries.4_2: @, I'm thinking of going ice skating some day. You got time for that?#$b#We'll have to go down into the city for that, though.
